description: Our cameraman met sexy Sam Cuthan as he was shopping for a new mortgage. It didn't take long for the conversation to switch from numbers to a modeling offer. Sam wasn't quite happy with the money he was currently making so he quickly accepted to strip for cash. As soon as he opened his shirt, leaving his tie in place, we knew that his hairy muscled body would make him a very popular newcomer on Maskurbate.
title: Sam Cuthan, Scene #01
